Osei Bonsu (October 22, 1900 – March 1, 1977) bụ onye Ghana na-akpụ ihe na onye na-arụ ọrụ nke ịkpụ Ashanti.
A kụziiri ya ịkpụ ihe dị ka onye mmụta n'okpuru nna ya
Ọ malitere site na ọrụ sitere n'aka ndị isi Akan
Ọ pịrị ọtụtụ ihe site na mmalite afọ iri abụọ ya ruo ọnwụ ya n'afọ 1977
Ọ bụ onye isi na-akpụ ihe nke Asantehene atọ (ndị eze zuru oke nke Alaeze Ashanti): Prempeh I, Osei Tutu Agyeman Prempeh II, na Opoku Ware II
N'ọrụ a, ọ nwetara ọtụtụ ọrụ, gụnyere ọrụ maka Ghana National Museum.
N'afọ 1975 n'afọ 1976, Bonsu gara mba United States dị ka akụkụ nke  mmemme nke ụlọ ọrụ nke Smithsonian akụkọ ifo nke mba Amerika
Mgbe Prempeh nke Mbụ lọtara n'ala ọzọ, e nyere Bonsu ọrụ dị iche iche gụnyere mkpara ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ, mma agha, akpụkpọ ụkwụ flywhisk, na ihe ịchọ mma maka akpụkpọ ụkwụ
N'ụzọ dị mkpa, a gwakwara ya ka o nyere aka n'ịrụgharị Golden Stool, ihe nnọchianya a ma ama nke ike maka ndị eze Ashanti.
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na British Museum, Ghana National Museum, na Fowler Museum na UCLA.
